Test GSEA Analysis of Acromegaly
========================================================

```{r data-entry}
deseq_analysis_file <- '../data/processed/Annotated DESeq Results without Outlier - Acromegaly.csv'
deseq_analysis <- read.csv(deseq_analysis_file, row.names='X')
ordered_deseq_analysis <- deseq_analysis[order(deseq_analysis$pval), ]
ranked_list_format <- ordered_deseq_analysis[,c('external_gene_id','pval')]
write.csv(ranked_list_format, "../data/processed/Acromegaly_Ranked_Gene_List.rnk")

```
